Stripe recurring payments allows customers to store credit card information for future purchases. Card data is stored with Stripe, not on your own servers.
Note that 2CheckOut does not support renewal terms based on a number of days, only weeks, months or years.
Method to use for recurring payments

Enter any information needed to complete the transaction. For example, where to post a check.
You can use {id} to display the transaction ID.

<#CUSTOMER_NAME#>,
This email is to let you know that the shipment we previously emailed you about has been delayed: - - - - - - - - - - <#ITEM_LIST#> - - - - - - - - - -
<#TRACKING_NH#>

<#CUSTOMER_NAME#>,
An invoice has been generated for you. Please log in to submit payment for this invoice. If payment has not been submitted before your purchases' expiry date the purchase(s) will expire. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Invoice Title......: <#TITLE#> Invoice Total......: <#TOTAL#> Invoice ID#........: <#ID#> - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Click here to pay the invoice: <#LINK#>

<#CUSTOMER_NAME#>,
The following items have now been shipped: - - - - - - - - - - <#ITEM_LIST#> - - - - - - - - - -
<#TRACKING_NH#>
The invoice contains renewals for purchases which can no longer be renewed. Please contact us for assistance.

<#STAFF_NAME#>,
A support request in the '<#DEPARTMENT#>' support department has been created or replied to by <#POSTER#>.
<#TITLE#> ------------------------------------------- <#MESSAGE#> -------------------------------------------
<#REPLY_NOTIFY#>

<#CUSTOMER_NAME#>,
This is to let you know that we have not received a response from you regarding your support request '<#TITLE#>'.
If we do not receive a response within the next <#HOURS#> hours we will assume the matter is resolved. If this is not the case, please respond to your support request so we can look into the matter further.
The support request can be viewed at <#LINK#>. You can respond to this message at the link above, or reply to this Email.

<#CUSTOMER_NAME#>,
A member of staff has replied to your support request.
------------------------------------------- <#MESSAGE#> -------------------------------------------
The support request can be viewed at <#LINK#>. You can respond to this message at the link above, or reply to this Email.

%s,
This is to let you know that we have not received a response from you regarding your support request '%s' and will now assume the matter is resolved.
Should you need further assistance, please submit a new support request.

<#CUSTOMER_NAME#>,
In <#DAYS#> days, a renewal invoice is to be generated for your services which are soon to expire: <#PURCHASE_LIST#>
As we have a credit card on file, this will be automatically charged.
This message is for your information only. You will receive a further Email once payment has been taken. If there is a problem processing your card, you will receive a regular invoice.

<#CUSTOMER_NAME#>,
An invoice has been generated for you <#AUTOPAY_REASON#>
This message is for your information only - no further action is required.

<#CUSTOMER_NAME#>,
A member of staff has created a support request on your behalf.
------------------------------------------- <#MESSAGE#> -------------------------------------------
The support request can be viewed at <#LINK#>.

Hello,
Thank you for contacting us. We have received your support request '<#TITLE#>' and will reply as soon as possible.
Click here to respond to this message: <#LINK#>
Your password for this support request is "<#KEY#>".

<#CUSTOMER_NAME#>,
Thank you for contacting us. We have received your support request '<#TITLE#>' and will reply as soon as possible.
Click here to respond to this message: <#LINK#>
Notify me when I earn commission
Notify me when an item I've purchased has been shipped
Notify me when a customer replies to a new support request
Notify me when a customer creates a new support request
Notify me when a staff member replies to my support request
Notify me when an invoice expires
Notify me if my payment requires further action from me
Notify me when an invoice is generated
Notify me when my payment is received
Notify me if my payment fails
Notify me if my payment is held for approval
The transaction failed because the invoice was canceled while payment was pending.
The user started the transaction, but no payment was ever received.

Hello {member_name}, Invoice '<#TITLE#>' was generated on {date}. This invoice is now past due and the associated service has been canceled. Please log in to submit payment for this invoice. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Invoice Title......: <#TITLE#> Invoice Total......: <#TOTAL#> Invoice ID#........: <#ID#> - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Click here to pay the invoice: {link}

<#CUSTOMER_NAME#>,
Thank you for your order. See the instructions below for submitting your payment:
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - <#INSTRUCTIONS#> - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
If you would like to pay for this order using a different method, please click the link below: <#LINK#>

<#CUSTOMER_NAME#>,
Your payment for <#TITLE#> has been received and is pending approval.
You do not need to take any further action. Once your payment has cleared we will send you another Email.

<#CUSTOMER_NAME#>,
Your payment for <#TITLE#> has been refunded to you. If you were not expecting a refund, your payment most likely failed to pass our fraud checks, and as a security precaution has been rejected. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Invoice Title......: <#TITLE#> Invoice Total......: <#TOTAL#> Invoice ID#........: <#ID#> - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Click here to pay the invoice: <#LINK#>

<#CUSTOMER_NAME#>,
Your payment for <#TITLE#> was unsuccessful. If you paid by credit card, it may have been declined, or your chosen payment method failed to provide payment. Please log in to resubmit payment for this invoice. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Invoice Title......: <#TITLE#> Invoice Total......: <#TOTAL#> Invoice ID#........: <#ID#> - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Click here to pay the invoice: <#LINK#>

<#CUSTOMER_NAME#>,
Thank you for your payment for <#TITLE#>. Your payment has been received and your purchase is now active. <#SHIP#>

<#CUSTOMER_NAME#>,
A new invoice has been generated for you. We have tried to take payment automatically using the card details on file, however, the transaction was unsuccessful. Please log in to submit payment for this invoice. We would also recommend contacting your payment provider to address why the automatic payment failed. If payment has not been submitted before your purchases' expiry date the purchase(s) will expire. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Invoice Title......: <#TITLE#> Invoice Total......: <#TOTAL#> Invoice ID#........: <#ID#> - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Click here to pay the invoice: <#LINK#>
